FuncDef: This command is applicable only to LNS. By default traffic load balancing between the BB-ISAs is based on sessions. Each session is individually assigned to an BB-ISA during session establishment phase.

ParaDef.Info: Traffic load balancing between the LNS BB-ISAs is based on individual PPPoE sessions.
Traffic load balancing between the LNS BB-ISAs is based on tunnels.

ExtraInfo: Default: load-balance-method session - Per session load balancing is enabled by default.
